import Header from'./Header';import{useState}from'react';import{Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setemail]=useState("");const[password,setpassword]=useState("");async function signUp(){let data={email,password};const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8000/api/verifyLogin-user",{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Accept':'application/json'}});const result=await response.json();//    console.log(result);
}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"row justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"col-12 col-sm-10 col-md-8 col-lg-6 col-xl-5 col-xxl-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"card border border-light-subtle rounded-3 shadow-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"card-body p-3 p-md-4 p-xl-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"text-center mb-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{class:"fs-6 fw-normal text-center text-secondary mb-4",children:"Enter your details to Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{action:"#!",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"row gy-2 overflow-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-floating mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",class:"form-control",name:"email",id:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setemail(e.target.value),placeholder:"name@example.com",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"email",class:"form-label",children:"Email"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-floating mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",class:"form-control",name:"password",id:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setpassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"password",class:"form-label",children:"Password"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:"submit",onClick:signUp,value:"Submit",Submit:true,children:"Submit"})]})})]})})})})})});}export default Login;
